name: Dungeon Tracker
description:
Videogame made for Mini Jam 45! In this game you are a little explorer of smaller dungeons! Can you complete the game while collecting all the coins?

Controls:
-WASD or Arrows for the player movement.
-Right click and mouse movement for the camera control.
-Left click while placing the cursor on top of a platform (they are blue) in order to interact with it.

Depending on your screen resolution you might get stuck in some of the menu options (credits and controls). Sorry in advance.

Developed by: Marcos Briz Rangel

      Juan Vicente Martínez Gutiérrez
      Jorge Segarra Raro
      Gonzalo Veiras García
